tool.name: Gaussian Filter
tool.description: The Gaussian filter is a smoothing operator that is used to 'blur' or 'soften' data and to remove detail and noise. The degree of smoothing is determined by the standard deviation. For higher standard deviations you need to use a larger search radius.

param.name: SIGMA
param.label: Standard Deviation
param.help: The standard deviation as percentage of the kernel radius, determines the degree of smoothing.

param.name: KERNEL_TYPE
param.label: Kernel Type
param.help: The shape of the filter kernel.
